module.name: package
module.keywords: module, piece part, package, package properties, mounting technology, lead form, seating plane, terminal, connection zone, functional orientation, physical orientation, datum, package body, shape, shape properties, simulation, analysis

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the package of a component that is part of the assembly. The shape of the component both as purchased and as delivered to a customer are provided. A common identifier for the shape of the package and placement orientation alignment information between 2 dimensional and 3 dimensional models are also provided. The information needed to allow industry or enterprise groups to populate explicit models and define associated properties and associated categories for standard packages and their versions is provided.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Part feature function, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1712.

outscope.li: non shape properties of a piece part.

definition.def: a model of an item for which there is some internal physical structure available to support detailed thermal or mechanical evaluation
a model of an item for which there is insufficient information available to manufacture the item
